pr_title: RM#27969: corrected link between back order and origin

timeline.message: RM#27969: corrected link between back order and origin

timeline.bodyText: please copy also the origin field
timeline.author: ale-axelor

timeline.bodyText: when using compare() it's better to write < 0 than == -1
timeline.author: ale-axelor
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -605,7 +605,7 @@
 	  	<action name="save"/>
     	<action name="action-stock-move-check-stock-move-line-real-qty"/>
     	<action name="action-stock-move-validate-shipment-informations" if="typeSelect == __repo__(StockMove).TYPE_INCOMING && !isReversion"/>
-	    <action name="action-stock-move-method-manage-backorder" if="stockMoveLineList.any{it?.realQty.compareTo(it?.qty) != 0} && !isWithBackorder"/> <!-- first condition = is it necessary to split SM -->
+	    <action name="action-stock-move-method-manage-backorder" if="stockMoveLineList.any{it?.realQty.compareTo(it?.qty) == -1} && !isWithBackorder"/> <!-- first condition = is it necessary to split SM -->

timeline.message: RM#27969: add origin in copy and correction feedback
